function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incompatibility with the definitions of green space, green space quality, mental health, or wildlife support","Impact":"Failure to capture relevant data and findings regarding the impact of green spaces on mental health and wildlife support","Mitigation":"Thoroughly review and align the definitions and criteria for green space, green space quality, mental health, and wildlife support to ensure comprehensive inclusion of relevant articles","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, reviewers, and data analysts","Owner":"Researchers, reviewers, and data analysts"},{"Description":"Exclusion of articles based on language (English only)","Impact":"Loss of valuable data and findings from non-English studies related to the impact of green spaces on mental health and wildlife support","Mitigation":"Consider translation services or collaborate with multilingual experts to include relevant non-English studies","Technologies":"Translation services, collaboration platforms","People":"Researchers, reviewers, and data analysts","Owner":"Researchers, reviewers, and data analysts"},{"Description":"Exclusion of study sites not located within urban or peri-urban areas","Impact":"Failure to capture the impact of green spaces on mental health and wildlife support in non-urban settings","Mitigation":"Consider expanding the inclusion criteria to encompass rural or natural settings to capture a comprehensive understanding of the impact of green spaces on mental health and wildlife support","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping tools, satellite imagery analysis","People":"Researchers, reviewers, and data analysts","Owner":"Researchers, reviewers, and data analysts"}]}
